siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Machines should not be feared
frontmatter.description: Machines are made to be handled by humans to do things we are not capable upon our own. Learn to harness the power of all machines.

frontmatter.title: Guide towards independence
frontmatter.description: Identify areas that will help most and work towards an enduring solution.

frontmatter.title: Silence is a reply
frontmatter.description: Silence is a reply, and it leaves much to infer.

frontmatter.title: Diligently appreciate opportunities
frontmatter.description: Three friends passed this year and did not make it to see age 38. Simply living is an opportunity to experience life.

frontmatter.title: Synthesize inputs and create original output
frontmatter.description: Generate new ideas by making connections others may not notice. Each individual's inputs are unique and shape outputs.

frontmatter.title: Recognize the options and unknowns
frontmatter.description: Recognize the options and the unknowns. Control what is possible.

frontmatter.title: Develop opportunities to enable others
frontmatter.description: Use skills to pave a way for others. Help others by supporting them.

frontmatter.title: Move projects forward with fresh perspectives
frontmatter.description: Revise requirements as new information becomes available. Don't assume the original path is the only way forward.

frontmatter.title: Default to supporting others
frontmatter.description: Look for ways to support others by default.

frontmatter.title: Listen and observe more in conversation
frontmatter.description: Spend more time observing and listening in conversation. Don't rush to speak or give opinions. It's needed less than you think.
